Frequently Asked Questions

Can I change plans later?

Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade at any time. Changes take effect immediately and we'll prorate the difference.

What happens after the free trial?

Your card will be charged after 14 days. You can cancel anytime during the trial with no charge.

Do you offer refunds?

Yes! We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all annual plans. Monthly plans can be cancelled anytime.

What payment methods do you accept?

We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, Amex) and ACH bank transfers for annual plans.

Is my data secure?

Absolutely. We use bank-level 256-bit encryption and are SOC 2 Type II certified. Your data is backed up daily.

Can I import my existing data?

Yes! We support imports from QuickBooks, Excel, CSV, and other major accounting platforms.
